name: Crypt Cart
description:
(It is recommended you play while listening to the audio)

Hi, this is my first game I made for my college assignment. It's an endless-runner with a rhythmic aspect to it. Please excuse my trash character illustrations and any bugs you encounter.

NOTE: You may need to zoom out your browser window (with CTRL - ) to play properly.

If you have time after playing my game, please consider giving me feedback through this form:

https://forms.gle/FPSHns2C5GqyQ8X46

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Use the arrow keys to move left or right between lanes.

When a monster is in coming, you can blast through it by aligning yourself with its eye (indicated by white warning), and pressing the space bar after you hear your gun load. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music by Seb Weal

Please consider following my Instagram page too: https://www.instagram.com/el.niblet/
